docs.text: Welcome and about me I'm Jarek Gaze, and I'm working in IT since 2002 and below blog is for ordering my technolgies knowladge to help in every day work or share with colegues how we can some things do. https://www.linkedin.com/in/jaroslaw-gaze/ Competency matrix Below I list technologies and my level of knowledge (in my opinion) Technologies Level Description OS Linux Windows Developer Python Spark Core Spark SQL Spark Streaming Ansible Bash Awk Perl SQL PL/SQL HQL HTML+CSS Collect needs Data structure Clean Code Databases Hive Oracle Mysql PostgreSQL Hadoop HDP CDP HDFS MapReduce Yarn Hive Kafka Cloud GCP Others JIRA Remedy Empty star - https://www.codesprogram.com/icons/Star-o-icon-in-font-awesome Half star - https://www.codesprogram.com/icons/Star-half-o-icon-in-font-awesome Full star - https://www.codesprogram.com/icons/Star-icon-in-font-awesome
